entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
